EmailTemplate.name: eCommerce Freshop Campaign.06-08-2021 RET eCommerce Freshop Campaign Email 3.Sub
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Webinar Replay: Grocery eCommerce
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Didn’t catch our Progressive Grocer webinar? It’s chock full of insights on how to enable a smarter strategy for eCommerce as a necessary channel for your chain. It also includes the story of one grocery chain who turned to NCR for help growing sales with curbside pickup and delivery—and what happened next. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
